Package jKMS.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractController
    Abstract for all controllers so that they all get a kms attribute.
    AbstractServerController
    Abstract Server Controller as parent for all server side controllers
    ClientController
    Client Controller for all pages on the client side [contract].
    ControllerHelper
    Some static help functions
    EvaluationController
    Everything round about Evaluation
    ExceptionController
    Controller for handling uncaught Exceptions
    FileDownloadController
    Controller for downloading any files.
    LoadController
    Class for game load/exclude/start
    LoginController
    Only one page to handle...
    PlayController  
    PrepareController
    Class for all preparing game functions
    ServerController
    Class for non categorizable server side requests
